ChunkText: the eli also assists umbc as a whole by providing cross cultural services in an ever changing world.
ContextBefore: the english language institute eli provides high quality training to those who need strengthen their english skills in speaking, listening, reading, writing, andor grammar for their personal and professional goals. the programs include intensive english program iep, academic english program aep, tesol, test prep toefl, ielts, and gre, skill-focused training e.g., accent reduction, professionalbusiness writing, conversation skills, etc. and more.
ContextAfter: in the center for global engagement, the area of international partnerships is the main point of contact for the partnerships that contribute to the work of the english language institute eli, education abroad, international student scholar services isss, the fulbright program, and international research collaborations.
